author: Chris W
title: Modern, clean and peaceful
text:
Have been travelling to London every week on business have begun to use this hotel now that I've started working on the south bank. It's quite modern and the room was very nice. I particularly like the fact that there is a hard pillow provided in the room as it's given me some of best sleeps I have had in a hotel in a while. The rain shower is pretty nice too.
London Bridge is just 5mins away and if your a foodie, Borough Market is just before. The Tate/Thames is also just across the road. Opposite direction from London Bridge is Waterloo (prob about 15mins walk but I've not done it yet.)
I've booked the next 4 weeks here as it's pretty decent hotel.
